A comparison of results for every iteration computed with CCD equations, using naive approach and intermediates. This works as a benchmark for the inclusion of Intermediates.
The system consist of 4 shells, and 4 hole states. 
I have used 11values of g, equally spaced, ranging from -0.5 to 0.5
Below are the reference energy and calculated correlation energies for all iterations in following order
Line 1: g, Reference energy, Number of iterations, energies for all iterations by Naive implementation of CCD
Line 2: g, Reference energy, Number of iterations, energies for all iterations by Intermediate implementation of CCD
-0.5 2.5 10 -0.0511401 -0.0685681 -0.0604458 -0.0642877 -0.0624728 -0.0633323 -0.0629255 -0.0631181 -0.0630269 -0.0630701
-0.5 2.5 10 -0.0511401 -0.0685681 -0.0604458 -0.0642877 -0.0624728 -0.0633323 -0.0629255 -0.0631181 -0.0630269 -0.0630701
-0.4 2.4 10 -0.037149 -0.0430688 -0.0410143 -0.0417351 -0.041482 -0.041571 -0.0415397 -0.0415507 -0.0415468 -0.0415482
-0.4 2.4 10 -0.037149 -0.0430688 -0.0410143 -0.0417351 -0.041482 -0.041571 -0.0415397 -0.0415507 -0.0415468 -0.0415482
-0.3 2.3 8 -0.0228001 -0.0243691 -0.0239882 -0.0240814 -0.0240586 -0.0240642 -0.0240628 -0.0240632
